title: The citrus flavonoid nobiletin prevents the development of doxorubicin-induced heart failure by inhibiting apoptosis.
abstract: The anthracycline anticancer drug doxorubicin (DOX) induces myocardial cell death and heart failure. The aim of the present study was to investigate whether nobiletin (NOB), a natural flavonoid isolated from citrus peel, has a protective effect against DOX-induced cardiotoxicity.
